text: Year 49 BC was a year of the pre-Julian Roman calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Lentulus and Marcellus. ==Events== * The Great Roman Civil War begins == Deaths == * Xuan, emperor of the Chinese Han Dynasty (b. 91 BC) * Zheng Ji, general during the Han Dynasty Category:40s BC
title: 49 BC
